channel.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack AGAIN!?[PI]
channel.description:
I had this problem before, but then it went away.
IT'S BACK. [code] [7/7/11 9:34 AM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1098 [7/7/11 9:34 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.activateSpecial( CombatAssistant.java:2926) [7/7/11 9:34 AM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.attackNpc(Combat Assistant.java:222) [7/7/11 9:34 AM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickNPC.processPacket(C lickNPC.java:99) [7/7/11 9:34 AM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [7/7/11 9:34 AM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1721) [7/7/11 9:34 AM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:160) [7/7/11 9:34 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:171)[/code]
Urgent help is needed...

item.title: [PI]Disconnection When Used Special Attack AGAIN!?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Any weapon’s special attack gives this? Show me the spot in the first error and second error so i know what it’s saying please.
